February 20, 2025 - The brand name is derived from the Latin motto dura lex, sed lex ("the law is harsh, but it is the law"). In January 2021, Duralex was acquired by International Cookware group, the owner (outside the USA) of the rival PYREX brand, for 3.5 million euros ($4.2m).
